name: Gruff's Zombie Rampage
description:
"I'm Gruff the caveman, and I'm going to KILL some zombies!

WARNING! Game may contain zombies, disturbing stuff and flashing lights.

One day, Gruff's world was invaded by zombies. Gruff didn't like this, so he found a gun, and decided to KILL them all.

CONTROLS: Mouse.

CREDITS: Not much.

You require internet to run this game.

Languages supoorted  currently: English, French, German
